name: ReMember - Fruits
description:
Dear Playa', welcome to the 2nd game of NWGames! Your goal here is to find the pair of the 16 fruits on the table. You can flip 2 cards at a time. If the 2 cards match, you earn points, and the cards remain flipped. If the cards you flip doesn't match, you have to try to remember their position, so you have a better chance next time.

The best player in this game is who is faster and more accurate.

Do you have a good memory? Show it!
